awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Hawaiian Cement Scholarship
awards.summary: A scholarship awarded to student's that the board deems to have potential for success based on extra-curricular activities and the rigor of the student's highschool curriculum.
